title: Webhook API Configuration
description: POST endpoint at /webhooks/:source that accepts webhooks from various email services and external systems with comprehensive event handling.

title: Webhook Signature Verification
description: Verifies webhook authenticity using cryptographic signatures for different email service providers (SendGrid, Resend, Mailgun, Stripe).

title: Multi-Provider Webhook Processing
description: Processes webhooks from different email service providers with provider-specific event mapping and data extraction.

title: Email Event Mapping
description: Maps provider-specific events to standardized email events (delivered, opened, clicked, bounced, unsubscribed) for consistent processing.

title: External System Integration
description: Handles webhooks from external systems like Appwrite (user registration) and Stripe (payment events) for cross-platform integration.

title: Webhook Audit Trail
description: Stores webhook events for audit purposes and emits processing events for monitoring and compliance tracking.
